amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that any prison conditions litigation may be settled between the parties without the involvement of a Federal court.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 16 in the Congressional Record of February 8, 1995) to make technical corrections to the bill clarifying that consensual out-of-court settlements are not liable to court enforcement from the limits the bill places on prospective relief settlements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Canady amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
